emuInput.TitMainTitle: Groom Ernest Wainard Warren and bride Harriett Ann Johnson Warren, posed in front of fireplace with mirror in Johnson home
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1953, pg. 11 reads: "Mr. and Mrs. Ernest Wainard Warren...in elaborate rites...Lovely Miss Harriett Ann Johnson, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. William Johnson, became the bride of Ernest Wainard Warren, brother of Mrs. Edward Johnson of Sharon, Pa., in a beautifully elaborate ceremony, Dec. 31, performed in bride's home..."
